runs.comm: 145.8 kph first ball, length ball on the stumps, bounce, hint of straightening, played out to gully in the Gambhir Dab fashion
turned wide of mid on for one
more bounce this time, nearly 146 kph, into Rahane's body, nudged awkwardly backward of square
sharp stuff, lots of bounce, away movement from back of a length, Gambhir tries to steer it from the crease, beaten

Gambhir survives, and almost gets a four, leading edge swirls over point as Gambhir tries to work a full delivery into the leg side, beaten by the late away movement, needs a slide to stop it just near the rope
straightening into Rahane, back of a length, climbing above the waist, dropped quietly near the pitch for one
darts it across the right-hander, good length, left alone
guided backward of point for a couple of runs, third man fields, Saeed Ajmal it is
full and right on the middle stump, this is a fine start from Pakistan, Rahane opens the face and runs it to third man
bowled full once again, just outside off, Gambhir cannot time the drive, short extra cover fields
looks to whip it through midwicket, mistimes again, to mid on
sharp run, needs a dive from Rahane, Gambhir drops the length ball onto the pitch, and off they go
Irfan, towering over Gambhir, walks up and gives him a long stare, that after beating him with a lifter on off stump, had Gambhir hopping
back of a length, into the body, nudged on the leg side for one
has to get on his toes to play the short of a length ball, hits the bat hard, runs to backward point
Rahane is not liking this combination of pace and bounce from Irfan, stays side on, withdraws his head and is hit around the waist
in the air, but past the man at point as Gambhir stabs at one outside off
shot, the first time an Indian batsman has looked comfortable this game, Rahane spots some width from Irfan, and bashes it over cover
moves in from a good length, and hits him on the pad as Gambhir fails to work it away
touch play from Rahane, width from Tanvir, just short of a length, not rising that much, and he adjusts to steer it past point
outside edge now, along the ground to third man, as he is squared up with one angling away on off and middle
shot! whipped wristily off the pad but straight to midwicket
he is very good with this slower one, and almost gets Gambhir, who gets on the front foot to drive, and ends up spooning it over point, falls short of third man
into the pads, nudged softly to short fine leg, who has a go at the stumps, misses, Rahane is in anyway by that time
this one did not get up much, he has been generating a lot of bounce, this barely got up above Gambhir;s knees, sailed down the leg side
bounces now alright, short of a good length, worked square into the leg side
lifted over extra cover, he's worked on this aspect of his game, makes some room and carves a full delivery comfortably over the infield
on middle stump now, pushed softly for a single
whoa, Gambhir hurried by a bouncer, right at his throat, he contorts his body as he is surprised, and manages to somehow send it over short fine leg with a half-hearted hook
and the Gambhir Dab appears, and results in him getting beaten outside off
slower delivery, but on the pads, and worked behind square for one
no width to time the punch from the crease, hit to cover
another slower one, 108 kph, mid off is deep, and Gambhir's mishit of a drive has no chance of carrying to him, don't think it would have even if he would have been up
now Rahane tries to steer a widish delivery going away from him, is beaten
opens the face and runs a short of a length ball to third man

that could be close, twice, and Gambhir survives, an lbw appeal is turned down, the length ball looked to be sliding down leg, he then races out of the crease, before realising there is no run at all and racing back, Tanvir's lob is too weak
and he is greeted with a boundary first ball, pitched up, not quite full, and Rahane has not quite got hold of it, but his timing is good enough to clear extra cover and mid off
another firm push, beats extra cover, but not mid off
runs a good length ball outside off to third man
bouncer, 142 kph, handled superbly, swivels calmly and hooks it along the ground through square leg
thump! that is not a bad way to get your first boundary, be it belated, not that short, but Gambhir has made up his mind to go over midwicket, and he does, all the way with a crisp, strong connection
stays in the crease, ball is pitched up, and he cannot do much with it, blocked
tossed up just outside off stump, he comes forward and nudges it to midwikcet
onto the pads now, fullish delivery, worked through square leg
from round the stumps now, right on off stump, defended
charges out, and has a go, thick-inside edge of a heave to deep square

exquisite, Rahane, stays still till the last moment as he Ajmal flights it outside off, last moment, he takes a step forward, to the pitch, and pushes the ball in the air, it carries into the crowd beyond deep extra cover, that is timing, some timing
offbreak defended to the leg side
bit of turn into the left-hander, hit high on the pad
quickish straighter one, he comes down the track and works it towards midwicket
had some width but could not time the cut, Jamshed lets it go through his hands at cover
slog-swept, tossed up delivery around off, and gambhir mows it into the gap between deep midwicket and long on
finding his range now, brings out his favourite loft over extra cover now, sweeper cuts it off
a quicker throw from deep midwicket would have tested Gambhir, he was slow in going for the second after some hesitation
he loves that area, he knows he cannot slog sweep that naturally, makes some room and lifts a shortish delivery over extra cover, that will do
tossed up ball dips outside off, he is coming forward but adjusts to dab it to short third
that hurried on for off stump, Gambhir back in the crease, keeps it out
too short and flat, hit out to sweeper cover
he tries lunging at this one for a sweep, mishits it to short fine
whipped off the pads to deep square
is already standing outside leg stump, Afridi's legbreak hurries on, does not bounce much, and he almost plays on
another mishit, dragged to long on
skiddy and quick, pulled away to deep square leg
shout for lbw, but this full delivery was sliding down the leg side
Rahane is gone, got a little too predictable, targetted extra cover again, lofted the full delivery cleanly, but there was a man in the deep there, straight to him
another pull from Gambhir, but not wide enough of deep square leg
driven solidly, short extra cover takes some pace off it with a dive
leading edge to point, Hafeez tosses it up slowly, Kohli pushes late from the crease
goes back to punch a quick offbreak past the non-striker
opens up, Hafeez angles it in, worked backward of square
wants to punch off the back foot through the off side, finds midwicket instead
a few steps down the track and blasted down the ground, and along it, long off can dive, only in vain
skips out again, gets too close to the pitch of the tossed up delivery, and hit to long off
full delivery clipped through midwicket

Gambhir is hitting it really hard now, but he might be in trouble this time, slogs it in front of square leg, the throw comes in, Gambhir comes back for the second, but his dive cannot beat the throw, Kamran Akmal does the remainder of the job
smack! Yuvraj Singh, first ball, down on a knee, slog sweep, and the ball sails deep into the crowd over deep midwicket, Yuvraj walks up to Kohli and smiles, they take some time to find the ball
quick and full on the stumps, played back to the bowler, now Afridi threatens to throw the ball back, then flashes a broad grin, and Yuvraj returns it
worked backward of square leg
tossed up full toss, hit out to wide long on, cannot place it wide of him
another boundary, Virat this time, lunges forward, picks it from off, and slog-sweeps it between deep midwicket and deep square leg
down the track, not to the pitch, but drives neatly down to long on
quick from round the stumps, skidding in too, he bends low in tight defence, just where does this technique go in Tests I wonder
whoa, he tries a wild slog to one going across him, is beaten by the carry, from a good length, he is a changed bowler, Irfan, from the one that debuted two years ago
still more bounce, this time Virat tries the cut, but he is not getting on top of the lift
appeal for caught behind, and he is given, Kohli falls to his third successive wild swing, given for an underedge through to the keeper off the short of a length ball
dhoni has his own way, he walks some feet outside off and nudges a back of a length ball to leg
speared in full and down leg from over the stumps
a high full toss now, down leg again as Yuvraj walks outside the line
serious, serious bounce, 140 kph, Kamran Akmal leaping in the air and taking it over his head, Yuvraj beaten on the steer outside off
hops and works a length ball off the pad to fine leg, where  a dive is needed as the ball was travelling quickly

and MS Dhoni is gone now, tame dismissal, he was on the back foot, trying to play his flailing punch through extra cover, plays outside the line, and the ball spins in a bit to graze the off stump enough to disturb a bail
tossed up, from round the stumps, on middle and off, pushed away
opens the face and runs a spinning delivery to short third man, cannot get the single
punched wide of extra cover and he is away with a single
pushed softly to cover off the front foot
cut off the middle stump, Raina making room and playing the cut with very quick hands, beats backward point's dive and that is enough, third man was up
beaten outside off stump with a good length ball going across, possibly in two minds whether to cut or punch
shortish, and the sound of bat hitting ball gives it away, Yuvraj hasn't timed the pull at all, it sails tamely to deep midwicket, Gul raises his arms, it was the slow offcutter
dabbed behind point, and Ajmal's throw from third man is wide
front leg out of the way, but cannot time the length ball through the off side, rolls through point
Gul goes for the yorker, swinging in a bit, low full toss worked through square
timing has suddenly been drained from India's strokes, Raina tries the whiplash loft over extra cover, mistimes it along the ground to the sweeper
offbreak from round the stumps, pushed softly to the off side from the crease
that came in with the angle, Raina was backing away, but had to punch it back to Ajmal
gone, Ajmal strikes again, short of a length delivery makes Raina have a wild heave, he misses as the ball skids in, stays a touch low, and uproots leg stump, Ajmal punches the air, what a star
wow, now Rohit is run out by several feet, no way there was a second run there, it was nudged  towards midwicket, and to Rohit's dismay, there was a direct hit as well
defended quietly, Ajmal giving no width at all

India all over the place, appeal for a run out, Kamran Akmal has been good with the takes today, the throw comes to his right from short third, he lunges to take it, falls over, but manages to lob the ball onto the stumps, batsman has made it, by a frame
they keep going, sharp bounce from Gul just outside off, Jadeja tries to steer it on his toes, and gets an edge through to the keeper

and he is cleaned up by the Guldozer's yorker, this is like the Pakistan of old, and also, like the India of old, yorker on target, Ishant's bat comes down in another time zone, and in real time, the leg stump is flattened
he went for it, he went for the yorker, it ended up as a full toss, and Dinda is able to pat it back
falls away a touch to the leg side and flat bats a back of a length ball which lands at deep mid on, long on fields
full delivery worked to midwicket
a slower one now, nudged to the off, Gul races in parallel with the non-striker, falls over to lob the ball at stumps, but he misses, and Dinda makes it
length ball dabbed behind point for a single
steered to third man
full and down the leg side into the pads, he gets it to short fine awkwardly
low full toss hit to extra cover
just out of the reach of extra cover, Hafeez it is, and has a smile on his face, one-handed flail eluded his outstretched hands as he ran back
full and hit out to point for a single
